subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Robert Woodard threw a three-hitter last night to help North Carolina beat top-seeded Clemson, 2-0, at the College World Series in Omaha. Reid Fronk and Josh Horton had consecutive doubles in the third inning to provide the only offense that the Tar Heels would need.
